name: Expedition Through the Stars
description:
You are a farmer that strongly believes that there is more out there besides Earth, and have a strong desire to explore beyond and see what new things you can harvest. Lucky for you, a new spaceship has been created to travel long distances in a short amount of time. Surely, you are one of the first ones to spend all of their savings on this one ship that will make you an ~intergalactic farmer~

Movement

Use WASD and/or the arrow keys to walk around.

Items and Tools

Tilling: Select the hoe tool to prepare the land for cultivation.

Seed: Select the seed of your choice and plant it on your designated land.

(not yet implemented) Watering: Select the watering can to help your plants grow.

Made by: ~Studio Farmers~
